sentences.sContent: She has a blue and green kite.
sentences.sContent_eng: She has a blue and green kite.
sentences.sCn: 她有一只蓝色和绿色的风筝。
小孩儿给自己的风筝装了尾巴。

sentences.sContent: He tried to fly his kite.

phrases.pCn: v. 放风筝；开空头支票；试探舆论
放风筝；开空头支票；签发通融票据以资弥补
喝醉酒的；被毒品麻醉的；如醉如痴的
追风筝的人（电影名，根据同名小说改编）

trans.tranOther: a light frame covered in coloured paper or plastic that you let fly in the air on the end of one or two long strings

trans.tranCn: 使用空头支票；像风筝一样飞；轻快地移动
